Gérard Darmon (a mụrụ na 29 Febụwarị 1948) bụ onye France-Moroccan na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu.
Ọ bụ di nke abụọ nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Mathilda May (nne nke ụmụ ya abụọ kachasị nta)
O nwere ụmụ atọ: Virginie (a mụrụ n'afọ 1968) na, site na Mee, nwa nwanyị Sarah (a mụrụ n'abalị 17 ọnwa Ọgọst afọ 1994) na nwa nwoke Jules (a mụrụ ya na 4 Machị 1997).
Darmon bụ onye Sephardic Jewish (Algerian-Jewish). N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2012, Eze Mohamed nke Isii nyere ya iwu ka ọ bụrụ nwa amaala mba Morocco.
